step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands toward your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you lift.
You're getting your hands behind your head. Try to spread your elbows wider and avoid pulling your head forward.
Holding the stretch is great! Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed and your head upright.
Returning to the start is good. Try to maintain the elbow position from step 3 as you lower your hands.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your head up and avoid pulling forward. Focus on spreading your elbows wider in the next sets for better results.
